master.about_text: Anil Kapoor is an Indian actor and producer who works primarily in Hindi films, in addition to Indian television and international films. In a career spanning over 40 years as an actor and since 2005 as a producer, Kapoor has appeared in more than 100 films. He has received several accolades, including two National Film Awards and seven Filmfare Awards. He is also one of the most recognized Indian film actors globally.
master.aboutPerson:
Anil Kapoor, a veteran of the Indian film industry for over four decades, has captivated audiences with his versatility and charisma, transitioning seamlessly from his early days as a supporting actor to his current status as a leading man who continues to command respect and admiration. Known for his iconic performances in films like "Mr. India," "Tezaab," and "Dil Dhadakne Do,"

Kapoor has showcased his remarkable range across various genres, leaving an indelible mark on Indian cinema. His dedication to his craft shines through in his willingness to undergo physical and emotional transformations for his characters, a commitment that has garnered him numerous accolades, including two National Film Awards and six Filmfare Awards, solidifying his position as a critically acclaimed actor.

Beyond acting, Kapoor's influence extends into the realms of production and mentorship, where he inspires and shapes the careers of other artists, while his entrepreneurial spirit transcends the boundaries of entertainment, evident in his ventures into fashion and hospitality.

Kapoor's global recognition has seen him collaborate with international filmmakers, further establishing his talent on a broader stage. At 67, he remains a force to be reckoned with, constantly pushing boundaries and defying expectations. His legacy as a cultural icon and an inspiration to aspiring actors is undeniable, a testament to his enduring impact on Indian cinema.
master.awards: [National Film Award for Best Actor for Pukar (2001),Filmfare Award for Best Supporting Actor for Mashaal (1985)]
master.introductoryText: Anil Kapoor (born 24 December 1956) is an Indian actor and producer who works primarily in Hindi films, in addition to Indian television and international films. In a career spanning over 40 years as an actor and since 2005 as a producer, Kapoor has appeared in more than 100 films.
master.one_controversy: He was involved in a controversy in 2012, when he was detained at the New York airport for over two hours by the immigration officials, which sparked a lot of outrage and criticism from his fans and the Indian government. He later said that he felt angry and humiliated by the incident and that it was a case of racial profiling.
master.permanentAddress: 31 Shrinagar Residency Society, North-South Road No. 7, Juhu Vile Parle Development (JVPD)
master.top_5_songs: [My Name Is Lakhan (Ram Lakhan), Ek Do Teen (Tezaab),Kaate Nahin Kat Te (Mr. India),Jeevan Ke Din (Bade Dilwala),Gallan Goodiyaan (Dil Dhadakne Do)]
